#summary Getting started with the excel-cdk LICSS System tools.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

How to get started with the *excel-cdk LICSS System * tools

= Details =

  # Download *LICSS-[Version].zip* and extract the files from it
  # Follow the instructions in 'Readme.txt'
  # Open *!EnableChemicalSpreadsheet.xls* and the spreadsheet you want to enable in MS Excel and select the "Setup Workbook for Structure Display and Substructure Searching" button...

You might like to have a look at the IntroductoryVideo showing the features of the system and how to use them

= Compatability =

The main Excel enabling file, {{{EnableChemicalSpreadsheet.xls}}} was written using MS Excel 2007 for Windows.  It is saved in Excel for Windows, 1997-2003 format.  The system has been tested with Excel 2007 running under Windows Vista and with Excel 2000 and Excel 2003 running under Windows XP and Windows 7 (64 bit)
